page.title: 19MY DAD'S SHOP
page.content: My dad own's a shop in Hodge Lea called Handy Supermarket.When he bought it the man left it in a right mess.The mess was out of date food, bad food. The floor was dirty and we had to remove the shevles and price the food properly.Then the big day came when we opened the shop. Nearly all the people congratulated us for doing a good job. We bought all sorts of new foods like, baked beans, butter, frozen foods and the kinds of things people need every day. He also sells newspapers and comics.The closing times are Mon,Fri its 6.00,am to 7.00pm and on Sat its 7.00am to 6.00pm. On Sundays people have to wait till 12.00pm so they can buy our spirits. And on Sundays its close at 2.00pm. Our main attraction is the hire-a-video, we have a large selection.
